level.text: Consist of an assessment, which is at least three (3) hours in duration;
Be rendered once every six months, unless an additional billable unit of service has been authorized by DMH;

Be provided in a DMH-certified community mental health rehabilitation services agency, the client’s home or other community setting or a residential facility consisting of sixteen (16) beds or less; and
Meet all other requirements set forth in 22 DCMR ยง 3415.
Diagnostic/assessment services shall not be billed on the same day as assertive community treatment.
